name: Lucid Hunt
description:
Work in Progress Made for Mini Jam 105: Dream.

IMPORTANT NOTE: I did not manage to finish the game in time... But... I do fully intend to at the very least finish off the game in the coming days/weeks and make it fully available on Github.

When I started, I was in a bit of a rut. I wanted to make a game, but I always felt I had too much to learn to even know where to begin. Game code architecture, 3D modeling even certain features of the Unity engine were still completely outside of my comfort zone or just plain beginner level at best in my opinion. That said, in this project I've touched upon all of these and more. I've definitely grown as a developer, but I also need to work a lot harder on proper scope and time management if I'm gonna finish a game on-time for a game jam... Either way. It was fun. :-P

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Esc - Quit
  • Left Click - Attack (Not Yet Working)
Tools Used:

  • Blender - 3D Modeling
  • Unity - Game Engine

Thank You to Kenney.nl for the use of their assets:

  • Food - 3D Models (Not Yet Used)
  • Furniture - 3D Models (Not Yet Used)

All other Assets were Self-Made during the Jam

Source Code: Github - Please review and criticize my code. I don't need positive feedback, I need a better understanding.
